thread.title: Fantastic hotel right near the Eiffel Tower.
thread.title_full: Fantastic hotel right near the Eiffel Tower. - Review of Hotel de Londres Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Hallio1
title: Fantastic hotel right near the Eiffel Tower.
text:
An excellent boutique hotel in great location.
The rooms, although quite small (not surprising given location), were high quality and comfortable with everything you need (great toiletries, great wifi, nice decor).
The staff were very welcoming and let us have a later checkout.
Breakfast was a good quality continental selection and again the staff were great.
It's within easy walking distance of the Eiffel Tower and les invalides and has loads of restaurants and shops near by.
Highly recommend it!
